description: Oil prices are expected to stay above $100 a barrel this year as Europe and other regions struggle to wean themselves off Russian supply, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, though economic risks could slow the climb.
title: Supply fears to sustain oil rally, trumping recession risks - Reuters.com
content: June 30 (Reuters) - Oil prices are expected to stay above $100 a barrel this year as Europe and other regions struggle to wean themselves off Russian supply, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday, though… [+2252 chars]

title: Your Kitchen Scale's "Fluid Ounces" Setting Is a Lie

description: Norwegian oil workers and their employers have extended wage negotiations past a midnight deadline in a bid to avert a strike that could cut the country's crude production, industry representatives said on Sunday.
title: Norway negotiators work overtime to avert oil strike - Reuters
content: OSLO, June 12 (Reuters) - Norwegian oil workers and their employers have extended wage negotiations past a midnight deadline in a bid to avert a strike that could cut the country's crude production, … [+842 chars]

description: Oil prices slipped more than $2 on Monday as a flare-up in COVID-19 cases in Beijing quelled hopes for a rapid pick-up in China's fuel demand, while worries about global inflation and economic growth further depressed the market.
title: Oil prices slide on Beijing COVID warning, inflation concerns - Reuters
content: SINGAPORE, June 13 (Reuters) - Oil prices slipped more than $2 on Monday as a flare-up in COVID-19 cases in Beijing quelled hopes for a rapid pick-up in China's fuel demand, while worries about globa… [+1863 chars]

author: Reuters Editorial
description: 06/15 U.S. President Joe Biden on Wednesday demanded oil refining companies explain why they are not putting more gasoline on the market, sharply escalating his rhetoric against industry as he faces pressure over rising prices.
title: Biden demands oil companies explain lack of gas - Reuters.com
